titles.title: Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act
A bill to extend the requirement that drug manufacturers that increase prices faster than inflation pay an additional rebate to State Medicaid programs to include manufacturers of generic drugs.
Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to extend to manufacturers of generic drugs the requirement that drug manufacturers in certain circumstances pay an additional rebate to state Medicaid programs.
